attributes.action: Michael Christian and Mel Greig should face prosecution for Jacintha Saldanha's suicide
attributes.additional_details:
The Australian "Today FM" DJs Michael Christian and Mel Greig made a prank phone call, in what has been described as "Journalistic Trickery", which lead to the suicide of Jacintha Saldanha.

We, the undersigned, petition the government to undertake an investigation into whether these two thoughtless, idiotic individuals should face prosecution for the events that resulted in this nurse's taking her own life.
